languages.text: "Видите ли, эта записка... Я не успел прочитать текст, но саму бумагу я узнаю среди тысяч других. Такие листы бумаги, с особенным золотым тиснением по краю, лежат в кабинете моего отца". {n}Юноша опускает голову и нервно переминается с ноги на ногу.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Видите ли, эта записка... Я не успел прочитать текст, но саму бумагу я узнаю среди тысяч других. Такие листы бумаги, с особенным золотым тиснением по краю лежат в кабинете моего отца. Увидев эту записку, взятую с трупа, в ваших руках, я едва не захлебнулся в нахлынувшей на меня злости". {n}Юноша опускает голову и нервно переминается с ноги на ногу.{/n}
traits.speaker: YoungZaurback

languages.text: "That note, you see... I was not fast enough to read the text, but I would recognise the paper anywhere. Those sheets, with the custom gold embossing on the edges, can be found in my father's office." {n}The young man hangs his head, shifting uneasily from foot to foot.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Видите ли, эта записка... Я не успел прочитать текст, но саму бумагу я узнаю среди тысяч других. Такие листы бумаги, с особенным золотым тиснением по краю, лежат в кабинете моего отца". {n}Юноша опускает голову и нервно переминается с ноги на ногу.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "This note, you see... I was not fast enough to read the text, but I can recognise this paper anywhere. These paper blanks, with the special gold embossing on the edges, can be found in my father's office." {n}The young man hangs his head, shifting uneasily from one foot to the other.{/n}
traits.speaker: YoungZaurback

traits.locale_text: "That note, you see... I was not fast enough to read the text, but I would recognise the paper anywhere. Those sheets, with the custom gold embossing on the edges, can be found in my father's office." {n}The young man hangs his head, shifting uneasily from foot to foot.{/n}
traits.speaker: YoungZaurback

languages.text: 「このメモは…メモの内容を一読したわけではなく、この紙に見覚えがあるのです。この便せんは縁に金のエンボス加工を施した特注品で、父の執務室で見かけたものです」{n}若者は頭を抱えて不安げに身体を右へ左へとふらふらさせている。{/n}
languages.original_text: "That note, you see... I was not fast enough to read the text, but I would recognise the paper anywhere. Those sheets, with the custom gold embossing on the edges, can be found in my father's office." {n}The young man hangs his head, shifting uneasily from foot to foot.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「このメモは…メモの内容を一読したわけではなく、この紙に見覚えがあるのです。この便せんは縁に金のエンボス加工を施した特注品で、父の執務室で見かけたものです」{n}若者は頭を抱えて不安げに身体を右へ左へとふらふらさせている。{/n}
traits.speaker: YoungZaurback

languages.text: “这张纸条，如您所见……我刚刚并没看到上面写了什么，但这种纸就算化成灰我也认识。纸张的金边花纹是特别定制的，这是我父亲的办公室用纸。”{n}面前的年轻人垂下脑袋，不安地将身体的重心从一只脚换到另一只脚。{/n}
languages.original_text: "That note, you see... I was not fast enough to read the text, but I would recognise the paper anywhere. Those sheets, with the custom gold embossing on the edges, can be found in my father's office." {n}The young man hangs his head, shifting uneasily from foot to foot.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “这张纸条，如您所见……我刚刚并没看到上面写了什么，但这种纸就算化成灰我也认识。纸张的金边花纹是特别定制的，这是我父亲的办公室用纸。”{n}面前的年轻人垂下脑袋，不安地将身体的重心从一只脚换到另一只脚。{/n}
traits.speaker: YoungZaurback

languages.text: « Eh bien, vous voyez, cette note... Je n'ai pas eu le temps de la lire, mais je reconnaîtrai ce papier entre mille, avec ce relief doré sur les bords. Il vient du bureau de mon père. » {n}Le jeune homme baisse la tête tout en se balançant d'une jambe sur l'autre, visiblement très mal à l'aise.{/n}
languages.original_text: "That note, you see... I was not fast enough to read the text, but I would recognise the paper anywhere. Those sheets, with the custom gold embossing on the edges, can be found in my father's office." {n}The young man hangs his head, shifting uneasily from foot to foot.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Eh bien, vous voyez, cette note... Je n'ai pas eu le temps de la lire, mais je reconnaîtrai ce papier entre mille, avec ce relief doré sur les bords. Il vient du bureau de mon père. » {n}Le jeune homme baisse la tête tout en se balançant d'une jambe sur l'autre, visiblement très mal à l'aise.{/n}
traits.speaker: YoungZaurback

languages.text: «Esta nota, verá... No me dio tiempo a leer lo que ponía, pero podría reconocer el papel en cualquier lado. Este tipo de hojas, con los bordes gofrados en dorado, las tiene mi padre en su despacho». {n}El joven agacha la cabeza, moviéndose inquieto de un lado a otro.{/n}
languages.original_text: "That note, you see... I was not fast enough to read the text, but I would recognise the paper anywhere. Those sheets, with the custom gold embossing on the edges, can be found in my father's office." {n}The young man hangs his head, shifting uneasily from foot to foot.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Esta nota, verá... No me dio tiempo a leer lo que ponía, pero podría reconocer el papel en cualquier lado. Este tipo de hojas, con los bordes gofrados en dorado, las tiene mi padre en su despacho». {n}El joven agacha la cabeza, moviéndose inquieto de un lado a otro.{/n}
traits.speaker: YoungZaurback

languages.text: "Diese Notiz, wisst Ihr ... Ich war nicht schnell genug, um sie zu lesen, aber dieses Papier würde ich überall erkennen. Diese Briefbögen, mit der eigens angefertigten Goldprägung am Rand, sind im Büro meines Vaters zu finden." {n}Der junge Mann lässt den Kopf hängen und tritt unruhig von einem Fuß auf den anderen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "That note, you see... I was not fast enough to read the text, but I would recognise the paper anywhere. Those sheets, with the custom gold embossing on the edges, can be found in my father's office." {n}The young man hangs his head, shifting uneasily from foot to foot.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Diese Notiz, wisst Ihr ... Ich war nicht schnell genug, um sie zu lesen, aber dieses Papier würde ich überall erkennen. Diese Briefbögen, mit der eigens angefertigten Goldprägung am Rand, sind im Büro meines Vaters zu finden." {n}Der junge Mann lässt den Kopf hängen und tritt unruhig von einem Fuß auf den anderen.{/n}
traits.speaker: YoungZaurback

languages.text: "Gösterdiğiniz kâğıt... Üstünde yazanları okuyamadım ama kâğıdın kendisini bir bakışta tanıdım. Kenarlarında özel yapım kabartmalar yer alıyor. Babamın çalışma odasında da bunlardan var." {n}Başını öne eğen genç adam, huzursuzca ayaklarını sırayla yere basıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "That note, you see... I was not fast enough to read the text, but I would recognise the paper anywhere. Those sheets, with the custom gold embossing on the edges, can be found in my father's office." {n}The young man hangs his head, shifting uneasily from foot to foot.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Gösterdiğiniz kâğıt... Üstünde yazanları okuyamadım ama kâğıdın kendisini bir bakışta tanıdım. Kenarlarında özel yapım kabartmalar yer alıyor. Babamın çalışma odasında da bunlardan var." {n}Başını öne eğen genç adam, huzursuzca bir ayağından diğerine basıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: YoungZaurback
